name: Libbey Glass Company
biography: Glassworks. First active in 1818 in Massachussetts. In 1878 William L. Libbey leased the New England Glass Company glassworks in Cambridge, Massachusetts, changing the name to the New England Glassworks, L. L. Libbey and Sons, Proprietors. In 1883 Edward Drummond Libbey took over glassworks, and moved business to Toledo, OH; the company was renamed Libbey Glass Company in 1892. The period of 1878-1915 was known as the Brilliant Glass period.
